yaml.description: Here are some great **Django starter templates** depending on what you're looking for: from barebones setups to full-stack SaaS platforms.
yaml.title: Django Templates

markdown.markdown:
<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

The most popular full-stack starter.

- **Repo**: [cookiecutter/cookiecutter-django](https://github.com/cookiecutter/cookiecutter-django)
- **Features**:
  - Docker-ready
  - ASGI/WSGI support
  - Django Channels
  - Celery + Redis
  - PostgreSQL
  - Whitenoise
  - Gunicorn/Uvicorn
  - Caddy/Nginx optional
  - Production scripts + Terraform support

‚öôÔ∏è **Use:**
```bash
pip install cookiecutter
cookiecutter https://github.com/cookiecutter/cookiecutter-django
```

---

## ‚ö° 3. **Django React/Vue Starter Kits**

### üß© Django + React
- **Repo**: [justdjango/django-react-boilerplate](https://github.com/justdjango/django-react-boilerplate)
- **Features**:
  - Webpack + React frontend
  - JWT Auth
  - DRF backend

### üîß Django + Vue
- **Repo**: [gtalarico/django-vue-template](https://github.com/gtalarico/django-vue-template)
- **Features**:
  - Webpack + Vue
  - DRF backend
  - Hot-reloading
  - SPA friendly

---

## üöÄ 4. **Django SaaS Boilerplates**

### üß† [saasitive/django-saas-boilerplate](https://github.com/saasitive/django-saas-boilerplate)
- Stripe subscriptions
- Teams
- Invitations
- Docker
- Tailwind + HTMX

### üíº [vintasoftware/django-react-boilerplate](https://github.com/vintasoftware/django-react-boilerplate)
- Celery
- Stripe
- i18n
- Full test coverage

---

## üß™ 5. **For Testing or Teaching**
- [django-startproject](https://github.com/jpadilla/django-startproject)
- [DjangoX by W.S. Vincent](https://github.com/wsvincent/djangox): for educational purposes, includes login/logout/register templates.

---

## ‚úÖ Comparison Table

| Template                        | Frontend | Docker | Async | Celery | DB     | Ideal For           |
|---------------------------------|----------|--------|--------|--------|--------|---------------------|
| cookiecutter-django             | Optional | ‚úÖ     | ‚úÖ     | ‚úÖ     | Postgres | Full Production Apps |
| django-starter (Vincent)        | ‚ùå        | ‚ùå     | ‚ùå     | ‚ùå     | SQLite  | Minimal Setup        |
| django-react-boilerplate        | React    | ‚úÖ     | ‚úÖ     | ‚úÖ     | Postgres | SPAs                |
| saasitive django boilerplate    | HTMX     | ‚úÖ     | ‚úÖ     | ‚úÖ     | Postgres | SaaS Projects       |
| django-vue-template             | Vue      | ‚úÖ     | ‚úÖ     | ‚ùå     | SQLite  | SPAs                |

## üíª 2. **Django Cookiecutter**
The most popular full-stack starter.

- **Repo**: [cookiecutter/cookiecutter-django](https://github.com/cookiecutter/cookiecutter-django)

  - Docker-ready
  - ASGI/WSGI support
  - Django Channels
  - Celery + Redis
  - PostgreSQL
  - Whitenoise
